articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Serum Institute Of India Ships Its First Batch Of Malaria Vaccines To Africa - Free Press Journal
articles.description: The distribution of malaria vaccine across the African region will mark a significant step in the global fight against malaria
articles.content:
In a major feat, the Serum Institute of India (SII) has shipped its first set of R21/Matrix-M Malaria vaccine doses to the African region, which has a sizeable disease burden.
